Summary: I saw what I thought was an airplane but.......
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around July 7th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside of the car waiting for my wife to get off work.I saw what I thought was an airplane.The plane was traveling straight towards myself in the west direction.There is an airport some 10 miles away so I thought I was watching a plane.I notice the sound of the engine was not that of a normal aircraft.It had 3 ligths in a triangle pattern one green light in front and two red lights in the back.All three lights were flashing slowly.It got closer I noticed the sound saw the lights as it got directly above me it vanished along with the sound.I have been watching planes come and go while waiting for my wife and I have never seen a plane travel this route so low and in this direction.The feeling I got after I saw this was very shocked because I had never seen a plane suddenly shut off all lights and engine sound too.It baffled me.I have also seen lights that seem to keep their distance from me but also seem to follow me.I will drive to Tampa and pick up my 2 sons and have a light some distance away from me but travel along with me like (it) thinks that I do not notice this thing off in the distance keeping up with me.It has done this to me more than a couple of times.It looks like a star but its way to bright be a star and star do not fly ahead of you about a couple of miles and sit there until you catch up and then take off another couple miles ahead and sit and wait for you.Well thats all for now. Thank You
